title: FS: F. jones Hips (sold) & F Smith P150 (available, price drop)

posts.post_title: FS: F. jones Hips (sold) & F Smith P150 (available, price drop)
posts.post_content:
,

Couple of raw cards for sale, see pics.  Price is shipped. Comment sold or DM.  

SOLD! Fielder Jones Hips - Sovereign 150 (estimate 1.5-2 grade) pop 4 per psa, highest is a 3.5.  - $299 SOLD

Frank Smith (F. Smith) - Piedmont 150 (EX) - $120

Take both for $400.
